title: spiced ginger and date tea loaf
description: Ginger and date-studded sweet dough rippled with a signature blend of sweet Asian spices.Equipment and preparation: you will need a free-standing mixer fixed with a dough hook.
ingredients: 60g/2¼oz unsalted butter, plus extra for greasing
50g/1¾oz stem ginger in syrup, chopped, plus 2-3 tbsp syrup from the stem ginger for the glaze
1 tbsp green cardamom pods, seeds only
